item.title: 好莱坞认为谁会收购华纳兄弟？
item.description: 我们请 700 多位业内专家评选出了最佳流媒体服务、最差首席执行官和下一位电影巨星。【原文：We asked more than 700 industry experts to name the best streaming service, worst CEO and next big movie star.】

item.title: 无人机盾牌公司在股票销售引发愤怒后制定高管持股政策
item.description: 在公司高层领导的一系列撤资引发投资者反弹之后，DroneShield Ltd. 将为所有董事和高级管理人员制定强制性最低持股政策。【原文：DroneShield Ltd. will set up a mandatory minimum shareholding policy for all directors and senior managers after a series of divestments from the firm’s top leadership sparked investor backlash.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因年底反弹希望而走高：市场综述
item.description: 随着交易商为假期做准备，亚洲股市周五追随美国股市的涨势，有望以积极的姿态开盘。【原文：Asian equity markets are poised for a positive open, tracking gains in US stocks on Friday as traders gear up for the holiday period.】

item.title: 数以千计的新人推动人工智能数据中心淘金热
item.description:
随着众多其他参与者纷纷涌入人工智能领域，大科技公司在人工智能基础设施领域的主导地位正在缩小，并将对全球经济产生影响。【原文：

Big Tech's dominance of AI infrastructure is shrinking as a host of other players pile into the arena — with global economic consequences.

】

item.title: 首席财务官发言：雪佛龙和生物技术先驱的直言不讳
item.description:
石油巨头的财务总监艾米尔-邦纳和Alnylam公司的杰夫-波顿谈论了2026年以及各自公司的未来。【原文：

The oil major’s finance chief Eimear Bonner and Alnylam’s Jeff Poulton talk about 2026 and what’s ahead for their companies.

】

item.title: 印尼急于弥补赤字，富裕家庭面临税务审计
item.description: 印尼正试图通过对富人和大企业进行额外纳税审查，在年底前填补异常严重的收入缺口。【原文：Indonesia is seeking to plug an unusually deep revenue shortfall before year-end by scrutinizing wealthy individuals and big businesses for extra tax payments.】

item.title: 旧金山停电期间，Waymos 冻结并阻断了交通
item.description: Waymo的无人驾驶乘车服务是旧金山大面积停电事件中备受瞩目的受害者，整个城市的汽车在行驶中被冻住，扰乱了交通。【原文：Waymo’s driverless ride services were a high-profile victim of a power outage that affected large swaths of San Francisco, with cars freezing mid-ride across the city and disrupting traffic.】

item.title: Permira 和 Warburg 同意以 84 亿美元收购 Clearwater Analytics
item.description: 以 Permira 和 Warburg Pincus 为首的一批私募股权公司已同意收购 Clearwater Analytics Holdings Inc.【原文：A group of private equity firms led by Permira and Warburg Pincus has agreed to acquire Clearwater Analytics Holdings Inc. in a deal valuing the investment and accounting software maker at $8.4 billion including debt.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克称暂停降息是她目前的基本立场
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，货币政策目前处于一个良好的位置，可以暂停并评估第一季度降息 75 个基点对经济的影响。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said monetary policy is in a good place to pause and assess the effects of 75 basis points of rate cuts in the economy during the first quarter.】

item.title: 报告称，OpenAI 的业务销售利润率有所提高
item.description: 据《The Information》杂志报道，OpenAI 今年已从其企业业务中挤出了更好的利润率，因为它正在努力保持其在人工智能领域的领头羊地位。【原文：OpenAI has squeezed better margins out of its enterprise business this year, as it races to maintain its pole position in artificial intelligence, according to a report in The Information.】

item.title: Saipem 赢得卡塔尔海上工程总承包合同，价值 31 亿美元
item.description: 能源服务和钻井专家 Saipem SpA 与海洋石油工程有限公司（Offshore Oil Engineering Co.Ltd. 获得了卡塔尔能源液化天然气公司（QatarEnergy LNG）的海上工程总承包合同。【原文：Energy services and drilling specialists Saipem SpA and Offshore Oil Engineering Co. Ltd. have been awarded an offshore EPCI contract by QatarEnergy LNG.】

item.title: 哈塞特称最高法院面临关税退款问题的风险
item.description: 美国总统的最高经济顾问周日表示，最高法院如果做出裁决，取消唐纳德-特朗普的关税并退还所征收的进口费用，将造成重大的 "行政问题"。【原文：A Supreme Court ruling that scraps Donald Trump’s tariffs — and refunds the import fees collected — would create a major “administrative problem,” the president’s top economic adviser said Sunday.】

item.title: 恐慌情绪与泡沫忧虑预示 2026 年股票波动将加剧
item.description: 由于投资者既担心错过人工智能的涨势，又担心这是一个等待破灭的泡沫，明年的美国股市将持续处于紧张状态。【原文：The US stock market is poised to be kept on edge next year as investors are caught between fear of missing out on the artificial-intelligence rally and concern that it’s a bubble just waiting to burst.】

item.title: 从六张图表看 2025 年股市的疯狂过山车之旅
item.description: 今年是美国股市极端化的一年。4 月份，S&P 500 指数跌至关税引发的熊市边缘，但在特朗普总统松口后迅速反弹，到 6 月下旬，在对人工智能的热情推动下，该指数屡创新高。【原文：This was a year of extremes for the US stock market. The S&P 500 Index plunged to the verge of a tariff-induced bear market in April, only to quickly rebound after President Trump relented and by late June was hitting repeated records fueled by enthusiasm for all things artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 在经历了辉煌的一年之后，新兴市场对 2026 年寄予厚望
item.description: 新兴市场有望在 2026 年初成为华尔街的热门交易，资金经理们押注一个多年的投资流入周期正在到来。【原文：Emerging markets are poised to start 2026 as a favored trade on Wall Street, with money managers betting a multi-year cycle of investment inflows is underway.】

item.title: Permira 和 Warburg 接近达成投资软件公司 Clearwater Analytics 的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以 Permira 和华平投资为首的一批私募股权投资公司正在就收购投资和会计软件制造商 Clearwater Analytics Holdings Inc.【原文：A group of private equity firms led by Permira and Warburg Pincus is in advanced talks to acquire investment and accounting software maker Clearwater Analytics Holdings Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国内阁计划于周一就特别预算法召开会议
item.description: 在预算谈判被推迟到 2026 年之后，法国内阁计划于周一举行会议，提出一项特别法律，允许内阁滚动重要支出和税收。【原文：The French cabinet plans to meet on Monday to present a special law that will allow it to roll over vital spending and taxation, after budget negotiations were postponed to 2026.】

item.title: 繁忙的假日购物周末，旧金山大面积停电，造成瘫痪
item.description: 周六，旧金山发生大面积停电事故，导致成千上万的家庭和企业陷入黑暗，在繁忙的假日购物期间，商店关门，交通中断。【原文：San Francisco was hit by widespread power failures Saturday that left thousands of homes and businesses in the dark, closing stores and disrupting transit during the busy holiday shopping period.】

item.title: 报道称哥伦比亚部长签署紧急税收法令
item.description: 据当地媒体周五报道，哥伦比亚政府已经签署了一项经济紧急法令，以筹集资金解决不断扩大的财政赤字问题。【原文：Colombia’s government has signed an economic emergency decree to raise funds to address a widening fiscal deficit, local media reported on Friday.】

item.title: 世界上最平静的股市对印度期权交易商构成挑战
item.description: 印度股市已成为世界上最平静的股市之一，平静到促使印度庞大的衍生品市场参与者重新思考战略。【原文：India’s stock market has become one of the calmest in the world — so calm that it’s prompting a rethink of strategies among players in the country’s vast derivatives space.】

item.title: 南方共同市场希望欧盟知道它还有其他选择
item.description: 在欧盟努力争取与南方共同市场达成贸易协议之际，对南美消费市场和丰富矿产资源虎视眈眈的竞争对手们也注意到了这一点。【原文：As the European Union struggles to complete a trade deal with Mercosur, competitors eyeing South America’s consumer market and vast mineral resources are taking note.】

item.title: 芝加哥议会通过 2026 年预算，弥补 12 亿美元缺口
item.description: 芝加哥市议会通过了一项约 160 亿美元的 2026 年预算；距离截止日期不到两周；但尚不确定市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）是否会签署或否决该计划。【原文：Chicago’s City Council passed a roughly $16 billion budget for 2026 — less than two weeks before the deadline — without certainty about whether Mayor Brandon Johnson will sign or veto the plan.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮为超安全市场带来大量债务：信贷周刊
item.description: 目前，推动美国经济增长的人工智能大潮在很大程度上依赖于信贷市场为投资提供资金，而公用事业是主要的借款方之一。【原文：The great artificial intelligence boom that’s fueling US economic growth now depends heavily on credit markets to finance the investments, and utilities are among the key borrowers.】

item.title: 高盛大宗交易先驱罗伯特-姆努钦逝世，享年 92 岁
item.description: 罗伯特-姆努钦（Robert Mnuchin）在高盛公司（Goldman, Sachs & Co.享年 92 岁。【原文：Robert Mnuchin, a pioneer of block trading during a 33-year career at Goldman, Sachs & Co. who had a second career as a prominent art dealer and whose son served as US Treasury secretary during the first term of President Donald Trump, has died. He was 92.】

item.title: 意大利电信据称将赢得最终裁决，收回 10 亿欧元资金
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份法律裁决，意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）在与意大利政府的长期法律诉讼案中胜诉，将为这家前电话垄断企业带来约 10 亿欧元（12 亿美元）的意外之财。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA won a long-running legal case against the Italian government that will provide the former phone monopoly with a windfall of about €1 billion ($1.2 billion), according to a legal ruling seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 现代战争的转变使国防企业成为成长股
item.description: 过去，军事承包商吸引股权投资者的是他们的稳健性，即可预测的收入、稳固的利润率和可靠的分红。时代变了。【原文：Time was, military contractors appealed to equity investors for their stodginess — predictable revenue, solid profit margins and reliable dividends. Times change.】

item.title: 惠誉因债务风险将加蓬评级进一步降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将加蓬的信用评级进一步下调至垃圾级，理由是政府赤字不断扩大，对该国债务的需求下降。【原文：Fitch Ratings has cut Gabon’s credit rating further into junk territory, citing widening government deficits and declining demand for the country’s debt.】

item.title: 西方能否夺回卖给中国的工业珍宝？
item.description: 在任由中国公司收购了数十年之后，美国和欧洲准备好了争夺 "生产资料"。【原文：After decades of letting Chinese firms buy up companies, the US and Europe ready for a fight over the “means of production.”】

item.title: 绘制全球经济图表：欧洲央行、英国和日本央行的利率走势存在分歧
item.description: 在欧元区通胀接近目标、经济活动更加强劲的背景下，欧洲中央银行连续第四次会议维持利率不变。【原文：The European Central Bank left interest rates unchanged for a fourth straight meeting against a backdrop of near-target inflation and sturdier economic activity in the euro zone.】

item.title: 可可价格暴跌。为什么巧克力仍然如此昂贵？
item.description: 在经历了去年的历史性上涨之后，可可价格正走向创纪录的年度低谷。但没有迹象表明，您的糖果、巧克力棒或巧克力圣诞老人的成本会很快跟进。【原文：After last year’s historic rally, cocoa prices are heading for a record annual slump. But there’s no sign the cost of your candies, bars or chocolate Santas will follow any time soon.】
